title: Have you ever questioned the existence of human beings? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks, A2A Have you ever questioned the existence of human beings? Nope. It was either abiogenesis or Pick Your Deity. Either way, no one was there to observe it, so no definitive answers are there to be had. If I know no answers are forthcoming, it makes zero sense to keep asking the question.

Have you ever questioned the existence of human beings? There is no question that I exist. I think, therefore, I know that I exist. However, there is no proof that the rest of you exist. I merely give you the benefit of the doubt that you are like me, thinking.

Have you ever questioned the existence of human beings? Not really. They are all around me. Human beings no doubt exist. As to where they came from, anyone with a science education in evolution knows the answer.
All the time. I think it is a typical human thing to do. Have dogs ever questioned their existence?

Humanity is still exists, evils are also exists, it can't be single things only. No one is perfect, the only thing perfect is our creator! So some people choses wrong path and others right paths, some people still have fear of doing wrong things, some people still helps others to help themselves, as they know God is always present for them. God bless you 😇 Insta-amarsakhre
